acceptP2PChallenge(uint256).details: Accept a P2P challenge (deposit stake as opponent)

createP2PChallenge(address,uint256,addre.details: Create a P2P challenge between two users

getNoParticipants(uint256).details: Get NO side participants for admin challenge

getYesParticipants(uint256).details: Get YES side participants for admin challenge

joinAdminChallenge(uint256,bool).details: Join an admin challenge (YES or NO side)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resolveChallenge(uint256,address,uint256.details: Resolve a challenge (only admin) Requires signed message from admin

setPlatformFee(uint256).details: Set platform fee percentage (in basis points: 1 = 0.1%) Max 50 basis points (5%)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
